name: weather-app
description: Weather App is an application that sends an address to the https://weather.gov api and returns the min and max tempuratures of the nearest stations in a user friendly interface. To build this app, the following technologies were used

scripts.setup: docker-compose -f ./server/docker-compose.yml up -d && npm --prefix ./client install && npm --prefix ./client run start

author: Thomas Defilippis
